title: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
OB: Column icons are not visible when connecting to a Derby database
SR: The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following settings: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a new dataset. 5. In the Edit Dataset window, select Query. 6. ... (additional information is needed in the SR section)
